title: Figcoms
description:
Figcoms transforms Figma comment management by turning scattered feedback into a structured Kanban workflow. Instantly sync comments, track progress with emoji status updates (✅ Done, ✍🏻 In Review, 👀 Working), and jump directly to any comment in Figma. No more lost feedback or endless scrolling—just a clean, organized way to manage design collaboration.

🚀 Launching soon! Join the waitlist now for early access and be the first to try it!
